name: Sword of Fargoal 2: Classic Dungeon-Crawler Adventure
blurb: We want to bring you Sword of Fargoal 2 for Mac/PC/Linux/iOS completely reimagined, reworked, and stuffed with awesome new features!

rewards.reward: \u201cVILLAGER\u201d LEVEL. Our sincerest thanks because every little bit helps. We\u2019ll also send you an exclusive Fargoal 2 wallpaper designed by Emmy award-winning animator Charlie Canfield. Plus a pledge at this level unlocks access to the Fargoal T-shirt shop where you can get an exclusive Kickstarter-edition Fargoal 2 design. And you\u2019ll get early notification about Sword of Fargoal 2\u2019s availability and a special thanks at our website fargoal.com.

\u201cSQUIRE\u201d LEVEL. Get the all-new Sword of Fargoal 2 mobile version for iOS (iPhone/iPad Universal). You also get a DRM-free version of the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack featuring a score by Daniel Pemberton (BBC, LittleBIGPlanet). We\u2019ll also send you the exclusive Fargoal 2 wallpaper designed by animator Charlie Canfield, plus our great appreciation for your support!

\u201cADEPT\u201d LEVEL. Get the all-new Sword of Fargoal 2 desktop version (Mac/PC/Linux). You also get a DRM-free version of the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack featuring a score by Daniel Pemberton (BBC, LittleBIGPlanet). We\u2019ll also send you the exclusive Fargoal 2 wallpaper designed by animator Charlie Canfield. And our \u201cThank You\u201d too!
\u201cVANGUARD\u201d LEVEL. Get in early and save! The first 1,000 earlybirds get everything at the $25 JOURNEYMAN LEVEL for less. Wow! What a deal!!

\u201cJOURNEYMAN\u201d LEVEL. For those who want to provide input on the last 20% of the game, this level gives you access to a special backer-only forum so you can make suggestions and get behind-the-scenes peeks into our development process. Plus you also get the PDF version of our lush Sword of Fargoal 2 game book with design notes, lore, photos, history, developer bios, excerpts from the game\u2019s script, deep dark secrets, and other cool \u201cmaking of\u201d goodies. Of course you\u2019ll also get the Sword of Fargoal 2 game (you\u2019ll specify either the iOS Universal version for iPad and iPhone OR the desktop version for Mac/PC/Linux), the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack, and the exclusive Fargoal 2 wallpaper.

\u201cRANGER\u201d LEVEL. By popular demand, we've added a way to target ALL of our game versions listed here in Ranger level! Now you can supersize the JOURNEYMAN level for just $4 more and get *both* versions of the game: iOS Universal (for iPad/iPhone) AND Desktop (Mac/PC/Linux). Plus if we hit our $110K stretch-goal and make an Android version, we'll throw that it as well (only included if we reach that level). Of course you also get everything else in the JOURNEYMAN LEVEL: Backer-only forum access, a PDF version of our "making of" game book, the soundtrack, and the exclusive wallpaper. That's a great range of rewards, Ranger!

\u201cFUZZY WEREBEAR\u201d LEVEL. Stretch-goal only. This is for people who want plushies and nothing but plushies (you know who you are!). And this level is only valid if we exceed our funding and make it to the stretch goal of $87K. If we do, we\u2019re making plushies! And you\u2019re getting the very first ones! Plus (as a group) you\u2019ll decide which character will make it to plushihood. Will it be the Hero? The Werebear? The Dwarf? The All-Star Linebacker? (no, not that one). If we don\u2019t achieve enough funding to make this stretch goal, we\u2019ll automatically bump you up to the $50 level, so it\u2019s a win-win situation. Note: international addresses please add $15 for shipping.

\u201cROGUE\u201d LEVEL. Wear your love for Fargoal on your sleeve \u2014 or at least on your chest with an exclusive backer-only T-shirt design by Charlie Canfield. You\u2019ll get the T-shirt sent to your US address free (or to international addresses for $15 more). Plus you\u2019ll get BETA ACCESS to the desktop game as we develop it. And of course you\u2019ll get all the other goodies: the Sword of Fargoal 2 game (both the iOS Universal version for iPad and iPhone AND the desktop version for Mac/PC/Linux), the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack, the Fargoal 2 wallpaper, a PDF version of the game book, and access to the backer-only forum.

\u201cDARK WARRIOR\u201d LEVEL. Stretch-goal only. SUPER SECRET FARGOAL PROJECT \u201cX\u201d shall be yours! This level is only valid if we exceed our funding and make it to the stretch goal of $140K. If we don\u2019t achieve enough funding to make this stretch goal, we\u2019ll automatically bump you up to the $100 level (even if that level is sold out). Plus, you will be \u201cfirst in line\u201d on the list to pre-order SUPER SECRET FARGOAL PROJECT \u201cX\u201d if it gets funded separately at a future date (separate purchase will be required since your current support will apply to the $100 reward level). Note: international addresses please add $15 for shipping.

\u201cADVENTURER\u201d LEVEL. Only 250 backers can get in on this level. And those lucky few like you will get a limited collector\u2019s edition 8x10 archival ink print of the Fargoal 2 game artwork (suitable for framing), signed by Charlie Canfield and Jeff McCord, plus you will be immortalized in the credits of all versions of the game. This is an amazing way to show the world that you helped Sword of Fargoal 2 happen. Plus you\u2019ll get BETA ACCESS to the desktop game as we develop it. And of course you\u2019ll get all the other goodies: the Sword of Fargoal 2 game (both the iOS Universal version for iPad and iPhone AND the desktop version for Mac/PC/Linux), the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack, the Fargoal 2 wallpaper, a PDF version of the game book, a SoF2 T-shirt, and access to the backer-only forum.

\u201cMONSTER SLAYER\u201d LEVEL. Want to be an Associate Producer of Sword of Fargoal 2? Only 50 backers can get in on this level. Why? Because those 50 will get a printed 24x36 super limited-edition retro-style Sword of Fargoal poster, as well as a limited collector\u2019s edition 8x10 archival ink print of the game artwork, signed by Charlie Canfield and Jeff McCord. That\u2019s not all. There\u2019s more printed deliciousness with a lavishly-bound print version of the Sword of Fargoal game book. Plus you\u2019ll get immortalized as an Associate Producer in the credits for all versions of the game, beta access, the Sword of Fargoal 2 game (both the iOS Universal version for iPad and iPhone AND the desktop version for Mac/PC/Linux), the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack, the Fargoal 2 wallpaper, a SoF2 T-shirt, and access to the backer-only forum.

\u201cHERO\u201d LEVEL. We\u2019re looking for five (and only five!) heroes to help out at this level. You\u2019ll work directly with Sword of Fargoal founder Jeff McCord and co-creator Paul Pridham to come up with a name and description of a new monster, treasure, or weapon in the game. You\u2019ll also get a rare mini Sword of Fargoal letter opener made just for this campaign. And of course you\u2019ll get all the Associate Producer perks: a printed retro-style Sword of Fargoal poster, a limited-edition print of the game artwork, a lavishly-bound print version of the Sword of Fargoal game book. Plus you\u2019ll get immortalized as an Associate Producer in the credits for all versions of the game, beta access, the Sword of Fargoal 2 game (both the iOS Universal version for iPad and iPhone AND the desktop version for Mac/PC/Linux), the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack, the exclusive Fargoal 2 wallpaper, a SoF2 T-shirt, and access to the backer-only forum.

\u201cRETRO\u201d LEVEL. Are you a RETRO Commodore 64 game lover? Always keeping your eye out for your own C64 system to play all the old games on? We have managed to do what is seemingly *impossible*: We've put together ten (10) original Commodore 64 systems, complete with the C64 computer and the 1541 floppy disk drive, PLUS a copy of the original C64 version of "Sword of Fargoal" on a new floppy disk. It will be packed professionally and shipped to you in the US at no additional cost (International shipping extra). This system *does not* include the original monitor, but we will provide you with a resource where you can purchase a cable suitable for viewing on your television set. In addition to this reward, you\u2019ll be immortalized as an Associate Producer in the credits for all versions of the game, receiving the following perks: a printed retro-style Sword of Fargoal poster, a limited-edition print of the game artwork, a lavishly-bound print version of the Sword of Fargoal game book, beta access, the Sword of Fargoal 2 game (both the iOS Universal version for iPad and iPhone AND the desktop version for Mac/PC/Linux), the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack, the exclusive Fargoal 2 wallpaper, a SoF2 T-shirt, and access to the backer-only forum.

\u201cLEGEND\u201d LEVEL. Jeff and Paul want to speak with five people directly and you could be one of them. Backers at this amazing \u201cLegend\u201d level will spend 30 minutes on a Skype call with Jeff and Paul to talk about the game (or anything else you want to discuss). You\u2019ll also get a custom portrait of YOU as a hero drawn by Charlie Canfield. And one of the songs in the official Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack will be named after you. You\u2019ll also work directly with Sword of Fargoal founder Jeff McCord and co-creator Paul Pridham to come up with a name and description of a new monster, treasure, or weapon in the game. You\u2019ll get the rare mini Sword of Fargoal letter opener. And of course you\u2019ll get all the Associate Producer perks: a printed retro-style Sword of Fargoal poster, a limited-edition print of the game artwork, a lavishly-bound print version of the Sword of Fargoal game book. Plus you\u2019ll get immortalized as an Associate Producer in the credits for all versions of the game, beta access, the Sword of Fargoal 2 game (both the iOS Universal version for iPad and iPhone AND the desktop version for Mac/PC/Linux), the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack, the exclusive Fargoal 2 wallpaper, a SoF2 T-shirt, and access to the backer-only forum.

\u201cEPIC HERO\u201d LEVEL. There can be only one Epic Hero backer \u2014 just like there can be only one Sword of Fargoal. And if you pledge at this level, the real-life Sword will be yours. That\u2019s right, an actual broadsword with semi-precious stones in the hilt, designed just for this campaign, will be bestowed upon you by Jeff McCord himself in person. Jeff will also make a personal appearance at dinner, a convention, or other event of your choosing in the USA (travel extra). In addition to the one-and-only true Sword of Fargoal, you\u2019ll receive Producer credit in all versions of the game, the orginal artwork of the Fargoal poster, an extremely rare autographed boxed version of the original C64 Sword of Fargoal game. Plus an actual vintage Commodore 64 (C64) computer, 1541 disk drive, and monitor! If you\u2019re our Epic Hero backer, you will also get a 30 minute Skype call with Jeff and Paul, a custom portrait of YOU as a hero drawn by Charlie Canfield, and one of the songs in the official Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack will be named after you. You\u2019ll also work directly with Jeff & Paul to come up with a name and description of a new monster, treasure, or weapon in the game. You\u2019ll get the rare mini Sword of Fargoal letter opener. And of course you\u2019ll get all the Associate Producer perks: a printed retro-style Sword of Fargoal poster, a limited-edition print of the game artwork, a lavishly-bound print version of the Sword of Fargoal game book. Plus you\u2019ll get beta access, the Sword of Fargoal 2 game (both the iOS Universal version for iPad and iPhone AND the desktop version for Mac/PC/Linux), the Sword of Fargoal 2 soundtrack, the exclusive Fargoal 2 wallpaper, a SoF2 T-shirt, and access to the backer-only forum. You basically get it all. Plus our undying gratitude.
